titles.title: A bill to provide permanent duty-free entry for certain mixtures of hot red peppers and salt.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to grant permanent duty-free treatment of mixtures of mashed or macerated hot red peppers and salt. Repeals a specified provision of the Schedules granting temporary duty-free treatment of such articles. Authorizes a refund of duties paid on such articles prior to the effective date of this Act.
